mapper.sql: select id, code, department, maker, patient_name, patient_sex, patient_address, birthday, height, weight, firsttime, specialsigns, vtehistory, ape, ledvt, otherthrombus, firstvtetime, vterelapse, malignanttumor, specifictumor, malignanttumordate, splenectomy, splenectormydate, pacemaker, pacemakerdate, atrialhistory, atrialhistorydate, levv, levvdate, ibd, ibddiagnosis, ibddate, connectivetissue, aas, la, acL_igg, acl_igm, lgg, lgm, sie, sjogrens, ssclerosis, mctd, rarthritis, uctd, octd, octdspecific, hps, hcylevel, maximum, threeitems, at, proteins, proteinc, hat, otherriskjudge, otherrisk, hypertension, coronaryheart, revascularization, diabetes, lhfailure, lhfailurespecific, renalinsufficiency, cerebralinfarction, copd, congenitalheart, chdspecific, hypothyroidism, hyperthyroidism, anemia, polycythemia, eosinophilia, plateletlower, plateletup, othercomplications, othercomplicationss, cteph, sixmwd, noreason1, walking, respiratory, vcmax, tlc, rv, rvtlc, fev1, fev1fvc, fef, tlcosb, tlcova, cet, heartmri, ppi, ctpat, mripae, cmri, rhc, noreason2, otherreason, pa, firstcatheter, hr, bpshrink, bprelaxation, bpave, rap, rapshrink, raprelaxation1, rapave, pap, papshrink, raprelaxation2, papave, pawp, pawpshrink, pawprelaxation, pawpave, co, comethod, ci, pvr, lvedd, lvef, pasp, tapse, pe, bloodgroup, ddimer, nt, ntnumber, ast, alt, tbil, dbil, cr, bloodgas, abgt, pco, po, sao, paa, anticoagulant, drug1, otherdrug, antiplatelet, drug5, otherdrug2, targeting, laxg, fivepi, drug2, era, drug3, prostacyclin, drug4, exfoliation, exfoliationdate, angioplasty, angioplastyfdate, death, deathreason, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, ts, dr, svo2 from sys_cteph

sys_dept on sys_cteph.department = sys_dept.dept_id where id = #{id} and dr = 0
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_cteph
code, department, maker, patient_name, patient_sex, patient_address, birthday, height, weight, firsttime, specialsigns, vtehistory, ape, ledvt, otherthrombus, firstvtetime, vterelapse, malignanttumor, specifictumor, malignanttumordate, splenectomy, splenectormydate, pacemaker, pacemakerdate, atrialhistory, atrialhistorydate, levv, levvdate, ibd, ibddiagnosis, ibddate, connectivetissue, aas, la, acL_igg, acl_igm, lgg, lgm, sie, sjogrens, ssclerosis, mctd, rarthritis, uctd, octd, octdspecific, hps, hcylevel, maximum, threeitems, at, proteins, proteinc, hat, otherriskjudge, otherrisk, hypertension, coronaryheart, revascularization, diabetes, lhfailure, lhfailurespecific, renalinsufficiency, cerebralinfarction, copd, congenitalheart, chdspecific, hypothyroidism, hyperthyroidism, anemia, polycythemia, eosinophilia, plateletlower, plateletup, othercomplications, othercomplicationss, cteph, sixmwd, noreason1, walking, respiratory, vcmax, tlc, rv, rvtlc, fev1, fev1fvc, fef, tlcosb, tlcova, cet, heartmri, ppi, ctpat, mripae, cmri, rhc, noreason2, otherreason, pa, firstcatheter, hr, bpshrink, bprelaxation, bpave, rap, rapshrink, raprelaxation1, rapave, pap, papshrink, raprelaxation2, papave, pawp, pawpshrink, pawprelaxation, pawpave, co, comethod, ci, pvr, lvedd, lvef, pasp, tapse, pe, bloodgroup, ddimer, nt, ntnumber, ast, alt, tbil, dbil, cr, bloodgas, abgt, pco, po, sao, paa, anticoagulant, drug1, otherdrug, antiplatelet, drug5, otherdrug2, targeting, laxg, fivepi, drug2, era, drug3, prostacyclin, drug4, exfoliation, exfoliationdate, angioplasty, angioplastyfdate, death, deathreason, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, ts, dr, svo2,
#{code}, #{department}, #{maker}, #{patientName}, #{patientSex}, #{patientAddress}, #{birthday}, #{height}, #{weight}, #{firsttime}, #{specialsigns}, #{vtehistory}, #{ape}, #{ledvt}, #{otherthrombus}, #{firstvtetime}, #{vterelapse}, #{malignanttumor}, #{specifictumor}, #{malignanttumordate}, #{splenectomy}, #{splenectormydate}, #{pacemaker}, #{pacemakerdate}, #{atrialhistory}, #{atrialhistorydate}, #{levv}, #{levvdate}, #{ibd}, #{ibddiagnosis}, #{ibddate}, #{connectivetissue}, #{aas}, #{la}, #{aclIgg}, #{aclIgm}, #{lgg}, #{lgm}, #{sie}, #{sjogrens}, #{ssclerosis}, #{mctd}, #{rarthritis}, #{uctd}, #{octd}, #{octdspecific}, #{hps}, #{hcylevel}, #{maximum}, #{threeitems}, #{at}, #{proteins}, #{proteinc}, #{hat}, #{otherriskjudge}, #{otherrisk}, #{hypertension}, #{coronaryheart}, #{revascularization}, #{diabetes}, #{lhfailure}, #{lhfailurespecific}, #{renalinsufficiency}, #{cerebralinfarction}, #{copd}, #{congenitalheart}, #{chdspecific}, #{hypothyroidism}, #{hyperthyroidism}, #{anemia}, #{polycythemia}, #{eosinophilia}, #{plateletlower}, #{plateletup}, #{othercomplications}, #{othercomplicationss}, #{cteph}, #{sixmwd}, #{noreason1}, #{walking}, #{respiratory}, #{vcmax}, #{tlc}, #{rv}, #{rvtlc}, #{fev1}, #{fev1fvc}, #{fef}, #{tlcosb}, #{tlcova}, #{cet}, #{heartmri}, #{ppi}, #{ctpat}, #{mripae}, #{cmri}, #{rhc}, #{noreason2}, #{otherreason}, #{pa}, #{firstcatheter}, #{hr}, #{bpshrink}, #{bprelaxation}, #{bpave}, #{rap}, #{rapshrink}, #{raprelaxation1}, #{rapave}, #{pap}, #{papshrink}, #{raprelaxation2}, #{papave}, #{pawp}, #{pawpshrink}, #{pawprelaxation}, #{pawpave}, #{co}, #{comethod}, #{ci}, #{pvr}, #{lvedd}, #{lvef}, #{pasp}, #{tapse}, #{pe}, #{bloodgroup}, #{ddimer}, #{nt}, #{ntnumber}, #{ast}, #{alt}, #{tbil}, #{dbil}, #{cr}, #{bloodgas}, #{abgt}, #{pco}, #{po}, #{sao}, #{paa}, #{anticoagulant}, #{drug1}, #{otherdrug}, #{antiplatelet}, #{drug5}, #{otherdrug2}, #{targeting}, #{laxg}, #{fivepi}, #{drug2}, #{era}, #{drug3}, #{prostacyclin}, #{drug4}, #{exfoliation}, #{exfoliationdate}, #{angioplasty}, #{angioplastyfdate}, #{death}, #{deathreason}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, #{ts}, #{dr}, #{svo2},
mapper.update: update sys_cteph set dr = 1 where id = #{id}

update sys_cteph set dr = 1 where id in
#{id}
